name: Choose Your Own Perambulation
description:
Have you ever dreamed of taking a walk through the streets of Victorian London and imagined what peculiar characters you might meet?

Well! Dream no more! You can control your own destiny and literally choose which path to take! 

No expense was spent in the making of this game, which some have described as being the closest thing to time-travel they have ever experienced.

"A work of art, You can almost smell the urchins." - Bertram Fiddle

"Fantastic stuff." - Emmelina Snoopsworth

"This was a complete waste of time." - Lord Arthwipe

Warning! requires reading words.
